si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was Rs 306.5399 and the sales price were 316.0679 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Thursday (February 22).

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was Rs 306.5399 and the sales price were 316.0679 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Thursday (February 22).

summary_lines: The US dollar's purchase price was Rs 306.5399, and the sales price was Rs 316.0679, as per the Central Bank's currency exchange rate released on February 22.
